item.description: Our February meeting included four new members despite the weather. We talked about different alternative modalities and targeted products for Fibromyalgia pain and fatigue relief. We shared so much information about ourselves and our experiences that I never got to talk about diet and supplementation in detail. Next month we will explore those subjects in depth and why they are essential to your recovery.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.why: You'll love it because everyone here, while in pain and suffering, is dedicated to getting well and are proactive in that endeavor.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia March Meeting
